AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Matron
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: Though matrons in the Widow core systems can rise through the ranks for many reasons, those who reach the heights of political power in the Reaver Castes dominating the rim rise for only one. Respect or death--these are the only options when dealing with {PAWN_nameDef}.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Palace child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was born on the Black Widow capital planet of Amadit's Husk. She was born to a wealthy family living in the gilded caves at the planet's hollowed out core.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Designer baby
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was genetically engineered to be a perfect child.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Spacer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was born on a space ship and spent most of their childhood on one ship or another. The close quarters meant that she had to be friendly with her neighbors and had to know how to maintain the ship SHE was on.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Colonizer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} grew up in a fledgling colony. She had to make due without assistance from the Widow empire.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Bully
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was a bully. She enjoyed roughing up the other children, and was very good at avoiding getting caught.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Repentant bully
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} used to be a bully, but then she messed with someone who fought back. The experience left her scarred, and she prefers to avoid fighting at all.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Stargazer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The stars always facinated {PAWN_nameDef}, and knowing that one day she could go out amongst them drove her through her education at a very directed pace.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Military child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: The BlackWidow Navy always facinated {PAWN_nameDef}. She often visited military bases and watched weapon tests.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Gaia child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was born on a Gaia planet, a planet perfectly suited for nearly any carbon based life form. She benifited from a near perfect enviroment to grow up in.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Ecumenopolis child
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was born in a planet sized city. She had to grow up with a population of potentially trillions, crowded condtions, and a lifestyle geared towards industry and science.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Colonizer
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} is from a high-gravity planet. As such, she is stronger then most.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Cavern crawler
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} grew from a broodling in one of the many cavern temples in Amadit's Husk, building strength by finding HER way to the tops of caves.

AlienRace.BackstoryDef.title: Digger
AlienRace.BackstoryDef.baseDescription: {PAWN_nameDef} was born on a more temperate hive-world and could frequently be found digging in the mud as a child, excavating potholes in the garden. She also learned a little about re-planting when she was forced to fix what was dug.
